customer_service_positive.prompt: A customer service representative helping a satisfied customer in a modern retail store, professional lighting, high quality

customer_complaint.prompt: A frustrated customer looking at a broken product, dramatic lighting, realistic style, customer complaint scenario

feedback_analysis.prompt: A team meeting analyzing customer feedback charts and graphs on a screen, corporate office environment, professional setting

writing_review.prompt: A customer writing a positive review on a smartphone, coffee shop setting, natural lighting, modern lifestyle

product_rating.prompt: A product showcase with 5-star rating symbols, clean white background, commercial photography style

satisfaction_survey.prompt: A customer satisfaction survey form on a tablet with checkmarks, office environment, professional documentation

analytics_dashboard.prompt: A dashboard with customer metrics and analytics, data visualization, modern UI design, business intelligence

happy_customers.prompt: A diverse group of happy customers holding shopping bags, retail environment, joyful atmosphere, natural expressions

support_agent.prompt: A customer support agent wearing headset, call center environment, professional lighting, service industry

feedback_form.prompt: A feedback form with handwritten notes, pen on paper, detailed comments, customer feedback documentation
